授業目的:
The purpose of this course is for students to learn useful strategies for everyday conversation
The purpose of this course is for students to learn  non-academic terms/expressions/aphorisms
到達目標:
Students will be able to recognize turn-taking strategies in conversation
Students will be able to understand information organization expectations in conversation
